snippet: Kim M. Catullo, a corporate lawyer who initially tried to talk Christine C. Quinn out of running for New York City mayor, said she had been worried about her wife’s safety.
abstract: Kim M Catullo, wife of New York City mayoral candidate Christine C Quinn, is taking on a more visible role in the campaign, despite her earlier reservations about Quinn's decision to run.
lead_paragraph: Kim M. Catullo, a corporate lawyer who initially tried to talk Christine C. Quinn out of running for New York City mayor, said she had been worried about her wife’s safety.

headline.main: Quinn’s Wife Edges Onto the Political Stage
headline.print_headline: Quinn’s Wife, a Reluctant Campaigner, Takes Her First Steps Out of the Background

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
